title: Development of Digital Badges for Chemistry Experts: Challenge-Based Simulation Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic chemical theory, laboratory practical experience, and proficiency in digital tool utilization
context.additional_context: A course where in-service elementary teachers strengthen chemistry expertise by completing challenges in VR simulation environments and earning digital badges.

learning_goals: Learners can apply safety protocols with 90% accuracy through chemical experiment simulations in a VR environment
Learners can improve chemical information literacy competencies by at least three levels based on ACS (American Chemical Society) standards through challenge-based problem-solving
Learners achieve over 80 points based on expert evaluation criteria by writing three project reports applying chemical concepts to earn digital badges
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
